CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Employees Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [Ees Loaded Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Employees Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [Ees Loaded Target Time]
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Employees_Loaded__c) && (NOW() <= Ees_Loaded_Target_Time__c ), "Inside SLA", IF(ISBLANK(Employees_Loaded__c) && (NOW() > Ees_Loaded_Target_Time__c), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: EE Load (P) SLA
